name: macro.vim
description: Provides syntax coloring for (VAX) Macro and/or Macro32 source code.
install_details:
Unpack the tarball and place "macro.vim" in <vimruntime>/syntax/macro.vim.

"filetype.vim.diff" contains a "diff -u" of the "filetype.vim" script. It adds the capability to recognize Macro files (extension ".mar") or hazard a guess on the ".mac" extension.
